translation: One Fascicle of the Encouragement Sutra
I ordered the chancellor of the left, Minister Jia.
He then instructed the good sentient beings of the states to follow him.
Every day, he recites the name of Amitâbha Buddha 1,000 times.
He stops bad verbal actions that are good.
This year, it's very hot and there's no one to collect the grain.
There were numerous illnesses and deaths.
The first is the disease of indiscriminate illness.
The second day, he became ill and died.
Third, he died of red and white dysentery.
Fourth, the red-eyed sickness dies.
The fifth person gave birth to a sick man and died.
The sixth died of water dysentery and illness.
The seventh wind sickness died.

source_sentence: 今勸眾生寫此經免一門難。
translation: Now, I'll encourage sentient beings to write this sūtra so that they won't have the difficulty of one aspect.
He copied the original text of the six relatives.
Seeing this sūtra and not writing it is the gate of cessation.
It's more difficult to get past this difficulty by the side of the gate.
Those without merit can't see this sūtra.
The sūtras came from the south.
On the eighth day of the first month, thunder and lightning flashed.
In the sky, there's a boy.
He was four years old.
He also saw an old man on the road.
He saw a snake with a body ten thousand feet long.
The human-headed bird then called the old man, saying.
It's because Mount Tai collapsed.

source_sentence: 要女人萬萬眾須得片萬萬願著病難差。
translation: It's necessary for 1,000,000 women to attain a million wishes, and it's difficult to get rid of illness.
Those who write this sūtra will be able to avoid this difficulty.

source_sentence: 不信者但看四月一日三家使一牛五男同一婦僧尼巡門難。
translation: Those who don't believe it simply look at the first day of the fourth month when three families send a cow, five men, one woman, monks, and nuns to travel through the difficulty of the gate.
He wrote this sūtra to transmit the true words of the sage.

source_sentence: 若袚[夙-歹+十]風[哅-凵]却不免難。
translation: If he doesn't [such - evil + ten] wind [such - ], then he won't be able to escape difficulty.

source_sentence: 相勸阿彌陀佛不久見太平時。
translation: They encouraged Amitâbha Buddha to not see Taitai for a long time.
